website_summaries.verdict: A perfectly good saw, but the fence leaves a lot to be desired. Performance is comparable to the Jet, but the Jet seems to be a little more well-built.
pros: A high-quality tool from a trusted brand
Heavy and stable, with plenty of power and more resaw capacity than any other model at this price point
cons: Does not come with a light and you'll probably want to replace the lightweight fence
Comes wired for 220V, so you can't plug it right into your normal home sockets

customer_reviews.title: Poor  quality built/assembly
customer_reviews.text: Problems from the very beginning with loose and falling parts. Poor blade guide construction as guides would not tighten well and fall/loosen while operating. Major blade drift. Had to replace Original blade after just a few cuts of hardwood asblade teeth broke off. Loose washer/nut inside unit. Replacement blade strapped out of wheel. Seeking full refund. I’ve had grizzly 14” bandsaws and never any problems with previous one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rambo’s

customer_reviews.title: Looking good so far!  A bit of a challenge to find blades that are over 130" long!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not owned this very long but I think it is going to be a favorite. My past experiences has been with a Delta 13" band saw. I am looking forward to the ability to handle up to 17" with this saw. IT IS VERY HEAVY!!! The base is a little smaller than I would like as I was leary of it possibly tipping so I made a dolly for it that is 4 to 6 inches larger than the base, is on wheels and has the saw bolted to its 3/4" plywood base. Locating replacement or supplemental blades can be a challenge due to the long size of the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon H. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: A goodbye so far
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this purchase. I thought I would immediately throw away the blade they came with it but I was pleasantly surprised. I find it to be very accurate out-of-the-box which I also found be a surprise. I haven't even had to adjust a single thing, the blade tension and wheel alignment and guide assemblies were dead on. customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bandsaw. I did and i have regretted it ever since. Do yourself a favor and spend a few extra dollars to buy a different brand. Where do i begin on the problems. First there is no way to adjust for blade drift without buying other pieces for the saw. Without doubt, that fence is completely useless. The blade guides have to be tightened, constantly. I have plenty of experience with other the setup and use of other bandsaw and was completely shocked at how terrible this machine is. There is a reason these anniversary editions are still for sale. Nobody is buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome band saw but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this band saw but I have a question for anyone else that has it. The stupid "support" bearing that rides behind the blade above the table, what the what? It's sitting 90 degrees offset from what an actual support bearing should. It does absolutely nothing and really is just in the way. I have read through the manual from front to back and even tried reading it upside down. All the diagrams show this bearing positioned the way it is installed but again, it doesn't do anything. Can someone please tell me what is the deal with this?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great saw, amazing value. Watch videos on setup from Snodgrass.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing saw for the money and for twice the money. Watch YouTube vids on how to tune and install blades by Snodgrass and this saw will amaze you. I bought the Resaw fence and I am glad I did. Watch the videos, properly setup this saw will perform every bit as good as a saw at twice the price. Have owned for three years.
customer_reviews.author: J. LaFreniere

customer_reviews.title: AN EXCELLENT AND DURABLE BAND SAW AT A FAIR PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this saw in July, 2014 and has been a superb tool. Originally I was planning to buy the Grizzly 14" Band saw and talked with a technician to obtain more information. After explaining my use the technician said the 17" saw would be a better fit for my applications. The 17" saw has been perfect and I have absolutely no complaints. Be assured that the Grizzly technicians know Grizzly tools well and are trusted advisers whenever I've had a question. This is an excellent band saw and will provide many years of excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good bandsaw, bad installment
customer_reviews.text: I received this bandsaw the month of February 2014. The delivery was on time but I was not impressed by the way it was put together; for example, the blade guard with the guide post was stripped. I called the company and they said they would send me a new guide post which I received a week later but it was the wrong type of guide post. So I had to make my own readjustments for the blade guard to hold properly on the guide post. But overall, the machine is strong and durable. I would like to be a customer for Grizzly but it doesn't look like a promising future with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Zulich
